text: Jason Bateman received a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame on Wednesday, with a speech by none other than his frequent co - star and friend Jennifer Aniston. While people were expecting Bateman's Arrested Development co - star Will Arnett to supply some laughs during his speech, many weren't expecting the amount of friendly roasting Aniston provided. Up Next : Was the Entire'Friends'Series Just a Dream in Rachel's Head? As E! reports, she started out going through Bateman's oft - forgotten child star beginnings, which included roles in Little House on the Prairie and The Hogan Family.
